author: Christina Carrega
title: Kentucky health officials beef up orders for rogue coronavirus patients
description: In Kentucky, four COVID-19 patients violated quarantine orders from medical professionals and will be required to wear ankle bracelets.
content: Four Kentucky residents have been slapped with wearing court-ordered ankle monitoring bracelets for violating an agreement with doctors to quarantine after being diagnosed or exposed to someone with a positive case of novel coronavirus, according to court doc… [+3566 chars]
